mil5.4.3:1.4: ‘sampajanamusavade lahukam apattim apajjati ekassa santike desanavatthukan’ti.
mil5.4.3:1.5: Bhante nagasena, ko panettha viseso, kinkaranam, yancekena musavadena ucchijjati, yancekena musavadena satekiccho hoti?
mil5.4.3:1.7: ‘sampajanamusavade parajiko hoti’ti, tena hi ‘sampajanamusavade lahukam apattim apajjati ekassa santike desanavatthukan’ti yam vacanam, tam miccha.
mil5.4.3:1.9: ‘sampajanamusavade lahukam apattim apajjati ekassa santike desanavatthukan’ti, tena hi ‘sampajanamusavade parajiko hoti’ti tampi vacanam miccha.
mil5.4.3:1.10: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho tavanuppatto, so taya nibbahitabbo”ti.
mil5.4.3:2.4: ‘sampajanamusavade lahukam apattim apajjati ekassa santike desanavatthukan’ti, tanca pana vatthuvasena garukalahukam hoti.
mil5.4.3:2.5: Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, idha koci puriso parassa panina paharam dadeyya, tassa tumhe kim dandam dharetha”ti?
mil5.4.3:2.8: “Idha pana, maharaja, soyeva puriso tava panina paharam dadeyya, tassa pana ko dando”ti?
mil5.4.3:2.9: “Hatthampissa, bhante, chedapeyyama, padampi chedapeyyama, yava sisam kaliracchejjam chedapeyyama, sabbampi tam geham vilumpapeyyama, ubhatopakkhe yava sattamam kulam samugghatapeyyama”ti.
mil5.4.3:2.10: “Ko panettha, maharaja, viseso, kinkaranam, yam ekassa panippahare sukhumo kahapano dando, yam tava panippahare hatthacchejjam padacchejjam yava kaliracchejjam sabbagehadanam ubhatopakkhe yava sattamakula samugghato”ti?
mil5.4.3:2.12: “Evameva kho, maharaja, sampajanamusavado vatthuvasena garukalahuko hoti”ti.
